title: Additional Features and Improvements
headline: Additional Features and Improvements
subtitle: Coming Soon to GTA Online
content:
Decemberâ€™s update will add exciting new features for players on latest console hardware including:

- Wildlife comes to Freemode: animals now rove the Southern San Andreas landscape across GTA Online.
- GTA+ Members will get access to The Vinewood Club Garage, a new vehicle storage facility.
- Players will be able to organize and manage vehicle collections more conveniently via the Interaction Menu.

Check out the latest article of the Rockstar Newswire for full details.
